title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Jun 16 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Jun 16 2022
description:
It's the one-year anniversary celebration after today's program of The Clay Travis & Buck Sexton Show. Clay is in NYC and dined with Buck and saw his "Buck Cave," the tiny bachelor pad he had heard about, as well as Buck's scooter. A minute into the show, C&B got serious to answer Jen Psaki's old question regarding, "What does soft on crime mean?" Clay addressed "Jen" directly and said it means two police officers killed by a gang member let free by Los Angeles DA Gascon. Sen. Rand Paul joins Clay and Buck and reacts to Dr. Fauci’s covid diagnosis, testimony. The Bidas Touch: $100 to fill up your gas tank. Jean-Pierre blames oil companies for high prices -- is it ignorance or dishonesty? Flashback to Ronald Reagan on Jimmy Carter. The new Reagan Democrats are Sanity Democrats. Emailer corrects C&B on Top Gun reference.

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
